languages.text: {n}Бросив на вас осуждающий взгляд, Паскаль с явной неохотой произносит:{/n} "Данная единица — тех-нунций, направленный высшим конклавом флота Осознание для разбирательства. Предъявляю код-регалии". {n}Датчик на нейрокогитаторе Паскаля сияет. В недрах его рождаются фальшивые верительные грамоты, расцвечивающие его ноосферную ауру новой информацией.{/n}

{n}Pasqal looks at you disapprovingly and says, with evident reluctance,{/n} "This unit is a Tech-Nuncio sent by the Supreme Conclave of the Cognisance Fleet to investigate. Presenting code regalia." {n}The indicator on Pasqal's neural cogitator glows. His Noospheric aura lights up with new data as fake credentials are generated in the deep recesses of the cogitator's circuitry.{/n}

languages.text: {n}パスカルはあなたを非難がましく見つめると、明らかに嫌そうな態度で話しだした。{/n}「当ユニットは、コグニサンス艦隊最高評議会より調査のため派遣された技術教皇使節である。コード・レガリアを送信」{n}パスカルの神経考算機についたインジケーターが光る。パスカルが持つ人類のオーラが偽の認証情報として生成された新しいデータによって、神経考算機回路の奥深くで光り輝く。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal looks at you disapprovingly and says, with evident reluctance,{/n} "This unit is a Tech-Nuncio sent by the Supreme Conclave of the Cognisance Fleet to investigate. Presenting code regalia." {n}The indicator on Pasqal's neural cogitator glows. His Noospheric aura lights up with new data as fake credentials are generated in the deep recesses of the cogitator's circuitry.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルはあなたを非難がましく見つめると、明らかに嫌そうな態度で話しだした。{/n}「当ユニットは、コグニサンス艦隊最高評議会より調査のため派遣された技術教皇使節である。コード・レガリアを送信」{n}パスカルの神経考算機についたインジケーターが光る。パスカルが持つ人類のオーラが偽の認証情報として生成された新しいデータによって、神経考算機回路の奥深くで光り輝く。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡不赞同地看着你，带着明显的不情愿，开了口。{/n}“本单位是由真理开拓者舰队最高秘会派来调查的科技术使，正在展示代码徽章。”{n}帕斯卡沉思者上的指示器闪闪发光。新数据点亮了他的通感光环，虚假的凭证正在沉思者回路的深处生成。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal looks at you disapprovingly and says, with evident reluctance,{/n} "This unit is a Tech-Nuncio sent by the Supreme Conclave of the Cognisance Fleet to investigate. Presenting code regalia." {n}The indicator on Pasqal's neural cogitator glows. His Noospheric aura lights up with new data as fake credentials are generated in the deep recesses of the cogitator's circuitry.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡尔不赞同地看着你，带着明显的不情愿，开了口。{/n}“本单位是由真理开拓者舰队最高秘会派来调查的科技术使，正在展示代码徽章。”{n}帕斯卡思考器上的指示器闪闪发光。新数据点亮了他的通感光环，虚假的凭证正在思考器回路的深处生成。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal vous lance un regard désapprobateur avant de déclarer avec réticence :{/n} « Cette unité est un technononce envoyé par le Conclave Suprême de la Flotte de la Connaissance pour mener l'enquête. Présentation du code. » {n}L'indicateur du cogitateur neuronal de Pasqal se met à briller tandis que son aura noosphérique s'illumine des faux identifiants générés par les circuits de son cogitateur.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal looks at you disapprovingly and says, with evident reluctance,{/n} "This unit is a Tech-Nuncio sent by the Supreme Conclave of the Cognisance Fleet to investigate. Presenting code regalia." {n}The indicator on Pasqal's neural cogitator glows. His Noospheric aura lights up with new data as fake credentials are generated in the deep recesses of the cogitator's circuitry.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal vous lance un regard désapprobateur avant de déclarer avec réticence :{/n} « Cette unité est un technononce envoyé par le Conclave Suprême de la Flotte de la Connaissance pour mener l'enquête. Présentation du code. » {n}L'indicateur du cogitateur neuronal de Pasqal se met à briller tandis que son aura noosphérique s'illumine des faux identifiants générés par les circuits de son cogitateur.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal te mira con desaprobación y dice mostrándose notoriamente reacio:{/n} «Esta unidad es un tecnonuncio enviado por el Cónclave Supremo de la Flota Conciencia para realizar una investigación. Presentando el código identificador». {n}El indicador del cogitador neural de Pasqal brilla. Su aura noosférica se ilumina con datos nuevos mientras se crean credenciales falsas en los recovecos más escondidos del sistema de circuitos de su cogitador.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal looks at you disapprovingly and says, with evident reluctance,{/n} "This unit is a Tech-Nuncio sent by the Supreme Conclave of the Cognisance Fleet to investigate. Presenting code regalia." {n}The indicator on Pasqal's neural cogitator glows. His Noospheric aura lights up with new data as fake credentials are generated in the deep recesses of the cogitator's circuitry.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal te mira con desaprobación y dice mostrándose notoriamente reacio:{/n} «Esta unidad es un tecnonuncio enviado por el Cónclave Supremo de la Flota Conciencia para realizar una investigación. Presentando el código identificador». {n}El indicador del cogitador neural de Pasqal brilla. Su aura noosférica se ilumina con datos nuevos mientras se crean credenciales falsas en los recovecos más escondidos del sistema de circuitos de su cogitador.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal blickt dich missbilligend an und sagt mit offensichtlichem Zögern:{/n} "Diese Einheit ist ein Tech-Nuntius, der von der Obersten Konklave der Erkenntnisflotte entsandt wurde, um Ermittlungen anzustellen. Ich präsentiere die Code-Insignien." {n}Die Anzeige auf Pasqals neuralem Cogitator leuchtet auf. Seine noosphärische Aura leuchtet mit neuen Daten auf, während in den tiefsten Winkeln der Schaltkreise des Cogitators gefälschte Identifikationsdaten generiert werden.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal looks at you disapprovingly and says, with evident reluctance,{/n} "This unit is a Tech-Nuncio sent by the Supreme Conclave of the Cognisance Fleet to investigate. Presenting code regalia." {n}The indicator on Pasqal's neural cogitator glows. His Noospheric aura lights up with new data as fake credentials are generated in the deep recesses of the cogitator's circuitry.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal blickt dich missbilligend an und sagt mit offensichtlichem Zögern:{/n} "Diese Einheit ist ein Tech-Nuntius, der von der Obersten Konklave der Erkenntnisflotte entsandt wurde, um Ermittlungen anzustellen. Ich präsentiere die Code-Insignien." {n}Die Anzeige auf Pasqals neuralem Cogitator leuchtet auf. Seine noosphärische Aura leuchtet mit neuen Daten auf, während in den tiefsten Winkeln der Schaltkreise des Cogitators gefälschte Identifikationsdaten generiert werden.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Sana onaylamaz bakışlar atan Pasqal, net bir isteksizlikle konuşuyor.{/n} "Bu birim, Malumat Filosu Yüce Meclisi tarafından inceleme yapmak amacıyla gönderilmiş bir Tekno Elçi'dir. Rütbe kodu sunuluyor." {n}Pasqal'ın sinirsel kavramsayarı parıldıyor. Kavramsayarın devrelerinin en derin girintilerinde yeni sahte kimlik belgesi verileri üretilirken Pasqal'ın Noosferik aurası ışıldıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal looks at you disapprovingly and says, with evident reluctance,{/n} "This unit is a Tech-Nuncio sent by the Supreme Conclave of the Cognisance Fleet to investigate. Presenting code regalia." {n}The indicator on Pasqal's neural cogitator glows. His Noospheric aura lights up with new data as fake credentials are generated in the deep recesses of the cogitator's circuitry.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal sana onaylamaz şekilde bakıyor ve net bir isteksizlikle konuşuyor:{/n} "Bu birim, Malumat Filosu'nun Yüce Meclis'i tarafından inceleme için gönderilmiş bir Tekno Elçi'dir. Rütbe kodu sunuluyor." {n}Pasqal'ın sinirsel kavramsayarı parıldıyor. Kavramsayarın devrelerinin en derin girintilerinde sahte kimlik belgelerinden oluşan yeni veriler üretilirken, Pasqal'ın Noosferik aurası ışıldıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
